skins.selfIntroduction: I am Graf Zeppelin. Though this name is worth little, you may call me by it if you wish. My only desire? To end the world. I shall not ask for your help though... as you are already a part of my plans.
skins.acquisition: You're my Commander? I am Graf Zeppelin. Since it appears that all the conditions have been met, let the final movement begin.
skins.login: The black goat's horn has already sounded. Quell your anxiety and wait at ease.
skins.details: If gods truly exist in this world, let us begin our slaughter with them.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I prefer the high ground, because I can see everything... everything that shall be destroyed...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Easy come, easy go... Aren't things like that better off not existing in the first place?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Life is akin to playing cards with a stacked deck. Doesn't it make you want to smash the entire table?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Quite brave, aren't you? As expected of the one I chose.

skins.shipDescription: So the Second Movement is a Lento of the summer and the sea? So be it... Since we will arrive at the Finale eventually, I suppose I can enjoy this moment of fleeting peace with you.
skins.acquisition: So the Second Movement is a Lento of the summer and the sea? So be it... Since we will arrive at the Finale eventually, I suppose I can enjoy this moment of fleeting peace with you.
skins.login: Didn't we agree to go to the beach? Where were you?
skins.details: Now that I think about it, other than forcing me to wear this skimpy bit of fabric, what else is this summer season even for?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Is there a nice vantage point on the beach to sit at? ...There isn't? Oh well...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I only wore this... "clothing" because you told me to. If you didn't come to the beach with me, I'd be... rather upset.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Eugen, don't rush me, the commander is still working. What am I going to do on the beach by myself...
skins.secretaryTouch: Is it time to depart? Wait a moment, these shoes are a bit hard to put on... Come help me out for a second...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hmph... Commander, do you also wish to become food for this child here?
